statements: SELECT * FROM audit_logs WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT log_id, event_type, action FROM audit_logs WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT log_id, event_type, details FROM audit_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_logs FROM audit_logs GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT MAX(timestamp) AS latest_log_time FROM audit_logs;
SELECT log_id, timestamp, event_type, user_id, action, details FROM audit_logs WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT event_type, action FROM audit_logs WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' AND timestamp < '2022-03-01'
SELECT DISTINCT event_type FROM audit_logs WHERE action = 'login' ORDER BY event_type ASC
SELECT * FROM audit_logs WHERE details LIKE '%error%' OR details LIKE '%warning%' ORDER BY log_id
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS count FROM audit_logs GROUP BY user_id HAVING count > 5 ORDER BY count DESC
SELECT * FROM audit_log;
SELECT action, timestamp FROM audit_log WHERE user_id = 15;
SELECT log_id, timestamp FROM audit_log WHERE action = 'login' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM compliance_status WHERE compliance = 'non-compliant' AND details IS NULL;
SELECT status_id, details FROM compliance_status WHERE log_id = 100 ORDER BY status_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM audit_log WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT action, COUNT(*) FROM audit_log GROUP BY action ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC;
SELECT * FROM audit_log INNER JOIN compliance_status ON audit_log.log_id = compliance_status.log_id WHERE compliance_status.compliance = 'Passed';
SELECT user_id, MAX(timestamp) FROM audit_log GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT a.log_id, a.user_id, b.compliance FROM audit_log a LEFT JOIN compliance_status b ON a.log_id = b.log_id;
SELECT * FROM audit_logs;
SELECT log_id, event_type, event_timestamp FROM audit_logs WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT log_id, event_type, event_timestamp, details->'action' AS action FROM audit_logs WHERE event_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT regulation_id, regulation_name, organization FROM regulations ORDER BY regulation_id DESC;
SELECT log_id, event_type, event_timestamp, user_id FROM audit_logs WHERE user_id = 12345;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE role = 'Admin' ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT regulation_id, regulation_name, organization FROM regulations WHERE organization LIKE '%Inc.';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE email IS NOT NULL AND role = 'Manager';
SELECT * FROM audit_logs ORDER BY event_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM user_info;
SELECT log_id, event_type, event_timestamp, user_id, action FROM audit_log WHERE user_id = 100;
SELECT user_id, username, role FROM user_info ORDER BY role DESC;
SELECT log_id, event_type, event_timestamp, user_id, action FROM audit_log WHERE event_type = 'LOGIN' ORDER BY event_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM audit_log_changes WHERE change_timestamp > NOW() - INTERVAL 1 DAY;
SELECT * FROM audit_log ORDER BY event_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM user_info WHERE role = 'Admin';

SELECT event_type, action_description FROM audit_log INNER JOIN action_details ON audit_log.action = action_details.action_id WHERE event_timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY event_timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, username, email, role FROM user_info WHERE username LIKE 'john%' AND (role = 'Admin' OR role = 'Manager');
SELECT user_id, username, email, role, change_timestamp FROM user_info INNER JOIN audit_log ON user_info.user_id = audit_log.user_id WHERE username = 'alice' AND role = 'User';
SELECT * FROM audit_logs;
SELECT user_id, action, timestamp FROM audit_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM user_accounts WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT requirement_id, requirement_name FROM compliance_requirements WHERE description LIKE '%security%';
SELECT log_id, detail_description FROM audit_log_details JOIN audit_logs ON audit_log_details.log_id = audit_logs.log_id;
SELECT * FROM user_accounts WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username, email, created_at FROM user_accounts WHERE username LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT log_id, user_id, action, timestamp FROM audit_logs WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp < '2022-02-01';
SELECT r.requirement_id, r.requirement_name, r.description, s.status FROM compliance_requirements r INNER JOIN compliance_status s ON r.requirement_id = s.requirement_id WHERE s.status = 'Pending';
SELECT l.log_id, d.detail_description FROM audit_logs l LEFT JOIN audit_log_details d ON l.log_id = d.log_id WHERE d.detail_description IS NOT NULL ORDER BY l.log_id DESC;
